author: Simon Difford
description: To quote our friends at Hawksmoor, where we discovered this delicious and indulgent cocktail, "Our take on a drink that doesn't take itself too seriously by the late, great Gregor de Gruyther. We've just added half a banana and blitzed it. Silly, but tasty."
name: Nuclear Banana Daiquiri

recipeInstructions.text: BLEND all ingredients with 9oz scoop crushed ice
